overview: JD and his boyfriend Lou are hiding out in an abandoned coffee shop in Bushwick, trying to stay away from the other degenerates left on earth. Their relationship, once on the rocks, is thriving under pressure. But when a self-proclaimed gay angel stops by for a visit, JD and Lou have to confront if what they're both clinging onto is still worth it at the end of the world.
tagline: A Question: would it make you love your boyfriend more or less? To know he'd fuck up the whole world to keep you?
title: Enraptured
